Notes: Divided into several variants and series, including armored variants. Uparmored variants (M1025P1 and M1114) are assigned with the Mechanized Infantry Division and Special Operations Command.
23 delivered to AFP on November 2011, PMC received 4 units.
20 M923 delivered in 2010, several more of different variants delivered in 2013.
Divided into several variants and series, in service with the PA since the early 1960s. 90 more units delivered in June 2011, more delivered in 2013.
Limited production run, introduced in the mid-1990s.
Divided into several variants and series, including short and stretched utility and armed variants, and modified variants for specialized units.
